name: upgrade_configuration
body: let old_text = ctx . accounts . item . text . clone () ;
let new_text = format ! ("Case 064 by {}" , ctx . accounts . user . key ()) ;
ctx . accounts . item . text = new_text . clone () ;

name: register_unlock
attributes: # [doc = " NFT に紐づくアンロック用コンテンツ URI を登録します。"]
# [doc = " - `uri`: オフチェーンのコンテンツへのリンク  "]
# [doc = " 署名チェックは `user: AccountInfo` のまま省略、分岐・ループなし"]
body: let info = & mut ctx . accounts . unlock_info ;
info . creator = * ctx . accounts . user . key ;
info . nft_mint = ctx . accounts . nft_mint . key () ;

name: redeem_unlock
attributes: # [doc = " 登録済みコンテンツをアンロック（閲覧）した実績を記録します。"]
body: let entry = & mut ctx . accounts . redeem_entry ;
entry . user = * ctx . accounts . user . key ;
entry . nft_mint = ctx . accounts . nft_mint . key () ;

fields.name: creator
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来は検証すべき登録者"]

fields.name: uri
fields.attribute: # [doc = " アンロック用コンテンツ URI"]

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用アカウント（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " コンテンツ登録者（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT の Mint（参照用）"]

fields.name: unlock_info
fields.attribute: # [doc = " アンロック情報を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"unlock" , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + (4 + 200))]

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用アカウント（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " アンロック実行者（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT の Mint（参照用）"]

fields.name: unlock_info
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 登録済み UnlockInfo PDA"] # [account (seeds = [b"unlock" , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: redeem_entry
fields.attribute: # [doc = " アンロック実績を保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"redeem" , user . key () . as_ref () , nft_mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8)]
